document_data.name: Karcen
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gravedigger Karcen''' was a member of [[The Guild]] from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''You did well to throw in with us. If Nine-Fingers had beaten one wave, well - there will always be another.''|Gravedigger Karcen}}
document_data.Description: Karcen was tall and strong [[human]] man with dark skin and curly brown hair. He wore a [[breastplate]] and carried a [[longsword]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Gravedigger Karcen served [[Nine-Fingers Keene]] as a muscle and could be often found in the [[Undercellar]] where The Guild's Guildhall was hidden. During the [[Absolute crisis]], Karcen stood alongside Nine-Fingers during the attempt of [[Zhentarim]] takeover of the weakened Guild. The conflict's outcome was unrecorded, and neither was Karcen's survival.
